name: Jellybone
description:
Jellybone is fun match 3 casual puzzle! Objectives differ in 300 levels. Make matches of 3 or more jelly or candy , create blasts! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging. Start your sweet journey in this puzzle adventure! 

Jellybone features: 
+ Sweet and shining Jelly, very delicious! 
+ 500 interesting levels 
+ Different difficulty levels . Sometimes easy as for kids , sometimes very hard levels.
+ Dynamic difficulty changes in same level. 
+ Multiple game goals, time mode, move mode, block mode, collect ingredients mode and more 
+Very small size but super tasty graphics
+ Create a high score with super boost!!
+ One of the easy candy games 
+ Lower battery drain.
+ Less ads , more play
How to Play:
+ Match the candies in a line to remove them + Match 4 candies to win the candy bomb form and 1 lighting bonus. + Match 5 candies to win the candy vortex form 2 lighting bonus. + The bombs can eliminate the candies touching it. + The Color-shifting  candy can eliminate to any other colored candy or jelly. Keep hungry, enjoy this sweet and delicious Jellybones!
